body.p:
Lebanon Ky --
February 1st 1864
Tho. E. Bramlette:
Gov of Ky:
D Sir: --

Geo. D. Boldrick desires the position of Captain in the Commissary Department. From my intimate knowledge of his energy honesty and morality, & his efficiency of First Clerk in the office of Capt Huber of Comm. Department, which position he has filled for many months, I would respectfully recommend him to your favorable consideration. He is emminently loyal.

I am
Very Respt.
Jams M. Fidler
